description: MADE WITH LOVE Great pizza sauce makes great pizza. Mutti Pizza Sauce in Aromatica or Classica is made to a traditional Italian recipe so you can make restaurant- quality pizza at home.
keywords: Pizza,Pescatarian,Eggplant,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Mozzarella, Eggplant & Basil Pizzas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Arrange eggplant, in a single layer, on trays. Brush eggplant with oil, then bake for 20 minutes, turning halfway through cooking, or until golden and tender. Transfer eggplant to a plate.
Roll each dough portion into a 26cm round. Using your fingertips, form a 1cm border around edge of each round. Line same trays with baking paper and transfer dough to trays.
Spread dough with sauce, then top with eggplant and mozzarella. Bake for 15 minutes or until base is golden and cheese has melted. Serve topped with basil.
